title: Plugin Development Guide
body_html:
Plugin Development Guide

Steps

  1. Define plugin resources in server-plugins/webhook
  2. Implement triggers & API in webhook-resources
  3. Define models in models/webhook
  4. Register triggers & endpoints in model builder

Triggers

  • Signature: (txes, control) => Promise<Tx[]>
  • Use control.findAll to fetch docs
  • Use control.txFactory to create Tx for model writes

API

  • Express router mounted under /api/v1/webhooks
  • Validate input; enforce permissions

Services

  • WebhookDeliveryService encapsulates HTTP calls & retries
